name: Cigarettes After Sex
description:
'''Cigarettes After Sex''' is an American [[dream pop]] band, formed in [[El Paso, Texas]], in 2008 by [[Greg Gonzalez]]. The band is known for their ethereal, [[Limerence|limerent]] and often dream-like musical style, lyrics often based on the themes of romance and love, as well as Gonzalez's voice, which has been described as [[androgynous]]. While marketed as an [[ambient pop]] band, Cigarettes After Sex are also considered to be [[Shoegazing|shoegaze]], [[slowcore]] and [[indie rock]].

The band's debut [[extended play]], ''I.'', was released in 2012, with the song "Nothing's Gonna Hurt You Baby" eventually becoming a [[sleeper hit]] through commercial [[Music licensing|licensing]]. After the release of the standalone single "Affection" in 2015, the band released their [[Cigarettes After Sex (album)|self-titled debut studio album]] in 2017 to positive reviews. The second Cigarettes After Sex studio album, ''[[Cry (Cigarettes After Sex album)|Cry]]'', followed in 2019. A third album, ''[[X's (album)|X's]]'', was released in July 2024.
